hooks.command: cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 2>/dev/null | grep '\.go$'); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi; true
cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 2>/dev/null | grep '\.go$'); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then golangci-lint run --quiet "$FILE" 2>&1 | head -20; fi; true
